en.pageTitle: Lipstick Emojis 💄 Copy and Paste - LipstickEmoji.net
en.metaDescription: Copy and paste beautiful lipstick emojis 💄💋 from the largest collection of makeup emoticons. One-click copy for all your beauty and fashion expressions!
en.ogTitle: Lipstick Emojis 💄 Copy and Paste - LipstickEmoji.net
en.ogDescription: The ultimate collection of lipstick emojis! Copy and paste 💄💋 and more beautiful makeup emojis with one click.
en.clickToCopy: Click any emoji to copy to clipboard!
en.exploreDescription: Explore and copy a diverse collection of lipstick emojis for your messages and social media.
en.allLipstickEmojisTitle: All Lipstick Emojis and Their Meanings
en.lipstickMeaning: 💄 - Represents cosmetics, makeup, beauty, and fashion. It can be used to indicate applying makeup or a stylish look.
en.kissMarkMeaning: 💋 - A symbol of a kiss, love, romance, or affection. It can also be used to signify a stylish or sensual expression.
en.usageScenario1: Beauty and Fashion: Use when talking about makeup tutorials, new lipstick shades, or a chic outfit.
en.usageScenario2: Love and Affection: Use the 💋 emoji to send a kiss to a friend or loved one.
en.usageScenario3: Celebrations and Nightlife: Indicate getting ready for a party, a date night, or a glamorous event.
en.historyContent: The 💄 Lipstick emoji was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. The 💋 Kiss Mark emoji was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and also added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015, making them early staples in digital communication for expressing beauty and affection.
en.storiesContent: The 💄 emoji has become a symbol for female empowerment and self-expression. It is frequently used in online communities and movements that celebrate individuality and confidence. The 💋 emoji is one of the most popular ways to convey love and flirtation in text messages, often replacing the need for words.
en.footerDescription: Your ultimate resource for lipstick emojis. Discover, copy, and share the perfect beauty emoticon for any occasion.

zh.pageTitle: 口红表情符号 💄 复制粘贴 - LipstickEmoji.net
zh.metaDescription: 从最大的彩妆表情符号集合中复制粘贴美丽的口红表情符号💄💋。一键复制，满足您所有美丽和时尚的表达！
zh.ogTitle: 口红表情符号 💄 复制粘贴 - LipstickEmoji.net
zh.ogDescription: 口红表情符号的终极集合！一键复制粘贴💄💋等更多美丽的彩妆表情符号。
zh.mainTitle: 口红表情符号 💄 复制粘贴 💋
zh.clickToCopy: 点击任意表情符号即可复制到剪贴板！
zh.exploreDescription: 探索并复制各种口红表情符号，用于您的消息和社交媒体。
zh.allLipstickEmojisTitle: 所有口红表情符号及其含义
zh.lipstickMeaning: 💄 - 代表化妆品、彩妆、美丽和时尚。它可以用来表示化妆或时尚造型。
zh.kissMarkMeaning: 💋 - 吻、爱、浪漫或情感的象征。它也可以用来表示时尚或感性的表达。
zh.usageScenariosTitle: 口红表情符号的使用场景
zh.usageScenario1: 美丽与时尚：在谈论化妆教程、新口红色号或时尚服饰时使用。
zh.usageScenario2: 爱与情感：使用💋表情符号向朋友或爱人发送一个吻。
zh.usageScenario3: 庆祝与夜生活：表示准备参加派对、约会之夜或迷人活动。
zh.historyContent: 💄口红表情符号于2010年被收录进Unicode 6.0，并于2015年添加到Emoji 1.0中。💋吻痕表情符号同样于2010年被收录进Unicode 6.0，并于2015年添加到Emoji 1.0中，使它们成为数字交流中表达美丽和情感的早期重要元素。
zh.interestingStoriesTitle: 口红表情符号的有趣故事
zh.storiesContent: 💄表情符号已成为女性赋权和自我表达的象征。它经常被用于庆祝个性和自信的网络社区和运动中。💋表情符号是短信中最受欢迎的表达爱意和调情的方式之一，通常可以取代文字。
zh.footerDescription: 您获取口红表情符号的终极资源。发现、复制和分享适合任何场合的完美彩妆表情符号。
